dict.acceptation: 焦急的；渴望的；令人焦虑的；流露出忧虑的；

sent.orig: After oil prices Luanwu crazy, anxious, anxious make the price of a few happy few worries.
sent.trans: 油价在经历疯狂的乱舞，急上急下的价格令几家欢喜几家愁。

sent.orig: Was this speech a product of anxious political calculation rather than statesman-like thoughtfulness and courage?
sent.trans: 这篇演讲是不是来自焦虑的政治盘算，而不是政治家应当具备的深思熟虑和勇气？

sent.orig: We are anxious that the same mistake is not repeated in the current round of negotiations.
sent.trans: 我们殷切希望在新一轮谈判中不要重犯同样的错误。

sent.orig: Current, there are two tendencies below this auspicious situation notable, make a person anxious even.
sent.trans: 目前，在这个大好形势下有两个倾向值得注意，甚至令人担忧。

sent.orig: Members were anxious about a meeting which extended into the weekend.
sent.trans: 会议被延长到这个周末了，成员们对此感到焦虑。
